about_the_game:
Welcome aboard the M.S. Salmon!

Cigarettes, half a bottle of gin, and scattered documents: Ben Hearnden's desk couldn't reflect his inner life any better. Immerse yourself in a thrilling story adventure of the late 1960s and help Ben Hearndes and Ranieri solve a mysterious murder case on the new luxury liner "M.S. Salmon". But beware: in his investigation, Ben not only gets closer to the truth of the crime but must also face his dark past.

Experience a nail-biting story in an anthropomorphic world centered around mystery and detective work with the return of interactive 2D animated movies, and influence the course through multiple choice. Dive into gripping dialogues, question witnesses and suspects, interact with your surroundings, and gather evidence to find the killer.

Expect action-based quick-time events, eventful mini-games, small puzzles, and captivating cinematics that redefine the boundaries of interactive storytelling.
The clock is ticking! Ben has only 72 hours before the ship docks and the killer escapes. Are you ready to put your skills to the test and solve the mystery of the murder?
